user.title: Connect to Bedrock Server Manager
user.description: Enter the connection details for your Bedrock Server Manager API.

select_server.title: Select Minecraft Server Instance
select_server.description: Choose the specific Minecraft server managed by this API instance that you want to add to Home Assistant.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the Manager API at the specified host/port. Check the address and ensure the Manager is running.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid username or password provided. Please check your credentials.
error.no_servers_found: Successfully connected and authenticated, but the Manager reported no Minecraft server instances. Please ensure servers are configured in the Manager.
error.server_validation_failed: Failed to validate the selected server '{server_name}' with the Manager API. It might not exist or there was an API error.
error.unknown_error: An unexpected error occurred. Check Home Assistant logs for more details.

abort.already_configured: This Minecraft Server instance ('{server_name}') is already configured in Home Assistant.

error.invalid_scan_interval: Update frequency must be at least 5 seconds.

send_command.name: Send command
send_command.description: Sends a command to the specified Minecraft server's console.

command.name: Command
command.description: The command string to send to the server console (e.g., 'say Hello World').
